item.title: Week 2: On Data Frames and Intro to ggplot2 For Making Graphs
item.description: Data Frames Data Frame Index Create New Column/Variable Inspect Data Frames Basic Graphs with ggplot2 Components of ggplot2 Graphs Types of Plots With ggplot2 Apply a Different Theme Data Frames Data frames are the most widely used data object in R. A data frame is a collection of vectors of the same length, which is also called columns. Each column have their own data type (e.

item.title: Week 1: Introduction to R
item.description: R and RStudio RStudio interface Basics Arithmetic Assignment Data types in R Data objects in R Vectors Vectors Arithmetic Vector index Matrices Matrix index Matrix Arithmetic Joining matrices Data frames Creating data frame Data frame index Column and Row Names Lists Relational Operators R and RStudio R is an opern-source programming language for statistical analysis. Being open-source, unlike similar software such as Stata, SAS and SPSS, it is free to use.
